ygData.subject: Re: Fletching?
ygData.msgSnippet: That is great news!  Naela can take up fletching!  I might head on over there this very night. Thanks for the info, Naela, Shadowmistress of the Teir Dal
ygData.messageBody:
That is great news! Naela can take up fletching! I might head on over
there this very night.

Thanks for the info,
Naela, Shadowmistress of the Teir'Dal

According to the illustrious Countess Bathory...
:)Grobb has most of the components you need for arrows and bows.
:)The one thing i heard was missing was the parabolic fletch, which you
:)dont have to worry about until you reach your cap with the first 4
:)easiest components, then reach you cap after upgrading to the medium
:)nock.
:)
:)Bathory
:)Cazic-Thule
